gts:
For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client — you have 24–48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

system

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

gts:
I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I’d grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn’t happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just… fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like “oh shit it’s the Reyna abuser…” when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they’d see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn’t participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.

gts:
Dental X-Ray, also known as radiographs, help the dentist in diagnosing any flaw between and inside your teeth. It further helps them in visualizing the disease of teeth that can’t be seen with a simple oral exam.

Such an X-Ray is performed yearly to track the progress of dental treatment and condition of teeth and gums. Compared to adults, it is inevitable for children to have dental X-rays for monitoring the growth of adult teeth. Through this, a dentist will be able to give his judgment regarding pulling over the baby’s teeth to avoid any sort of complications.

Dental X-Ray can easily spot the trouble early in your teeth, gums, jaw, and mouth. Getting early treatment for such dental problems will alleviate pain and irritation. For Dental X-Ray, you can always reach out to us anytime.

How Does a Dental X-ray Work?

Dental X-Ray is often conducted during routine visits where it shows the crown portion of your teeth and finds out if any signs of decay. To conduct this X-Ray, a patient is asked to place a plate in between their teeth where the machine will be placed on either side of your face.

Secondly, Panoramic x-rays are also a part of dental health treatment. It is taken from the outside of your mouth that gives a bigger and clear picture of the oral cavity. It also includes pictures of the sinus area and jawbones to check if there’s any oral disorder.

Most importantly, these X Rays are safe and emit quite a lower level of radiation.

Which are the key problems that dental X-Ray detects?

Dental X Rays can detect-

• Reveal bone loss or any infection in the bone

• Infection in the small areas between the teeth

• Helps in suggesting for dentures, braces, tooth implants, or any other dental procedure

• Reveal abnormalities like cysts and tumor

• Check if there’s enough space for new teeth fitting

Book an appointment for Dental X-Ray and maintain your oral hygiene under the guidance of professionals!

Sydney Sixers have been hit by injuries in the ongoing Big Bash League 2021–22. Tom Curran will miss the entire season due to a back injury and will return to the United Kingdom. Steve O’Keefe has been ruled out for a “short term”, while Ben Manenti has also been ruled out of the tournament due to a neck stress fracture.

Also Read: Shafali Verma Trains Against Bowlers for the Short-Ball Game

A Troublesome hotspot in the back has Forced Curran to leave the Tournament and go home to rehab

A troublesome hotspot in the back has forced Curran to leave the tournament and go home for rehabilitation. Meanwhile, O’Keefe strained his calf after a win over the Melbourne Stars at the MCG.

“On and off the field, those three guys play a big part for us and their presence around the team and on-field skills will be remembered by everyone in the group. But for us, we always look for 18-matches in our squad. We have ready players and we see this as an opportunity for others in our group.”

Also Read: Mohammad Rizwan Signs Sussex Agreement for T20 Blast

Tom Curran is One to Accept Challenges

“We pride ourselves on being a club and a team that accepts challenges. But to lose players of the caliber of Tom Curran and Ben. And keep SOK on the sidelines, will be a challenge for any team and those People are not easily replaced,” said captain Moises Henriques.

Henriques also emphasized that there is no need to press the panic button especially with some players coming back. “We saw Ben Dwarshui recovering from injury this week. Jackson Bird is not far away and Sean Abbott is back after the birth of his daughter. So there’s no need to panic,” he added.

Also Read: Legspinner Sandeep Lamichhane Named as Captain of Nepal

“There are guys like Lloyd Pope and Mickey Edwards who really deserve an opportunity. But because of the strength of our list they didn’t get as many chances as they deserved, so it will be little time for those guys to play. is a part of.”

The Sixers, who top the table after three wins from four games. Will “explore replacement player options for the injury in the coming days”.

Gaming industry is holding the future in metaverse, supported by blockchain it is shaping metaverse with Play-to-Earn model. Here comes MetaHIVE, which upgrades this Play-to-Earn model to Engage-to-Earn gaming model with introducing MetaHIVE Gaming Portals opening gateway to other metaverses and bringing benefits to users and partner projects.

BeeLabs introduces MetaHIVE Gaming Portal, which will broaden the reach of our users to other metaverse projects, it can be used to explore gaming, fashion, 3D experiences, concerts being held in other metaverses and almost everything you can think of.

Metahive is excited to announce its strategic partnership with VISHV Space. Our users will be pleased to know this!

Users will be able to hold VISHV NFT in MetaHIVE metaverse and vice versa so they can access Vishv Space game directly from MetaHIVE AR browser.

Users can earn $MHIVE tokens by spending time in VISHV Space using MetaHIVE gaming portal with our Engage-to-Earn module.

Users will be able to win VISHV Space NFTs by exploring MetaHIVE global scale play to earn.

Last but not the least VISHV Prime Gaming HIVELand will be customized with the beautiful space assets and will be auctioned through partnership, a dedicated HIVELand just for Vishv Fans.

The team at BeeLabs is delighted to be partnering with such a dependable team at VISHV Space for our MetaHIVE project to be a pioneer in making a breakthrough in the blockchain gaming industry.

About VISHV Space:

VISHV Space is a NFT space game being built on Solana blockchain. They provide an open metaverse game where you can choose any PFP character in your wallets like apes, monkeys, pandas and explore the metaverse or fight NPC pirates to win tokens.

About MetaHIVE:

MetaHIVE is first ever global scale, augmented reality based platform powered by Solana blockchain. Anyone with a mobile device or smart glasses can enjoy an interactive augmented reality experience tailored to the current real-world GPS location. Users can develop 3D content in the metaverse, own the hosted space as an NFT and place it anywhere in the world.

MetaHIVE is setting a new standard for augmented reality.

TWITTER|DISCORD|FACEBOOK|INSTAGRAM|TIKTOK|YOUTUBE

gts:
It’s hard to even start this text about my first impressions as I have a lot of them.

A lot of good impressions.

Since I arrived, I was always in motion, doing something, going somewhere, meeting someone. I didn’t have much time alone reminiscing and recollecting my thoughts.

Now after a week I’m settling down a bit and soon I’ll be writing and posting more texts and stories of my life here in Brazil.

My goal is to write a text every week about my Brazilian experience. I’ll be doing my best to overcome my shyness, in order to write, to record and to share my life with anyone who might be interested.

This is what it all started…

First of all I can’t even begin to express my gratitude to the amazing people from @keric_cadca, @associazioneinco, @avesol.associacao and @icyebrasil for allowing me to get this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

I feel truly blessed and thankful that I am able to go for this exchange and work on Globers Project financed by the Erasmus+ program of the European Union and call Brazil, this spectacular country, my home for the next 12 months.

Some businesses hire people for every kind of work but that can cost them quite a lot. Same is the situation when you are running a large business. Just a little different is that you have a proper accounting department. But still, accounting software can help the accounting staff a lot. It can make their work less, smart, and efficient. The most time taking task in any business is the accounting part. A simple solution to that is accounting software. It saves you time as everything is automated and saves you the salary cost as well. You can access your financial data anytime on any device with an internet connection. You can send invoices, access your pay-slips, view your unpaid invoices on your mobile, and make notes on the go. You do not have to keep records on a bunch of papers. All of your data is saved in the cloud and it is just one click away from you making it easy for you to access whenever you want. You do not have to go through a load of papers to find one document. Dashboards in accounting software can give you insight into your business’s financial situation. You can monitor in real-time your bank balances, invoices, and bills and compare year-over-year results. This can help you make informed decisions and grow your business.

Ola Books is a complete package for every accounting-related problem you can have while running a business. It gives you all the advantages described above. You can get to enjoy the flexibility of being able to manage your financial tasks from anywhere, anytime you want. You can also integrate different apps and tools into your accounting software.

#Switch to Ola Books.

For more information, visit https://www.olabooks.co/

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

gts:
Singles’ Day is China’s spending event of the year, with sales reaching a record $115 billion in 2020.

As consumers shop, ecommerce employees and delivery companies work overtime to keep the spree going.

Distribution centers bear the brunt of the workload and have to move billions of packages in days.

Singles’ Day proper started in China on Thursday, marking the beginning of the country’s largest online spending fest.

While this year’s event included a discount period on November 1, the true 24-hour sales frenzy traditionally launches on November 11, when consumers flood online shopping platforms like Alibaba’s Taobao and its rival JD.com.

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles’ Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year’s event.

Here are some photos that show how China moves billions of packages to hundreds of cities on its biggest spending day.

And Get Copy Ideas Fast.

What is StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator?

StoryLab.ai is an online tool that generates content ideas for you.

Are you struggling to find the perfect YouTube Title for your next video? We got you covered!

Simply enter your company name (optionally), describe your product and hit the ‘Inspire me” button.

Our A.I. generator will give you inspirational examples to add to your list of potential YouTube Video Titles.

Run the tool as often as you need to create your perfect YouTube video(s).

Get started for free

Why you should invest time in creating great YouTube Video Titles

When scrolling through YouTube or Social Media, what draws your attention?

It’s the headline and image of the video or post.

We all know this. Yet, many content creators just take 2 minutes to come up with a video title and the first one they come up with, is in their view the winner.

This is suboptimal to say the least.

You have spent so much time on creating a great video, a great image to draw attention, just to have a suboptimal video title.

Write great YouTube Video Titles in half the time

There is nothing worst than staring at a blanc piece of paper. StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Video Title Generator helps you to get new ideas and even complete copy with a click of a button.

Get inspired by how many different ways there are to describe your video title. Our Marketing Copy Generators run on GPT-3. Trained, as the largest and qualitatively best Natural Language Processing model.

Get started for free.

STORYLAB.AI GENERATORS

gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT’s innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer’s revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform’s competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker’s efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

gts:
The Return of the Valorant Champions Tour Tournament in 2022

With the recent conclusion of the 2021 Valorant VCT Champions Tournament, competitive players are left asking… what's next for the Valorant Competitive scene in 2022?

I can easily say that the competitive scene in 2021 for Valorant was a massive success. Valorant brought in the masses of audiences across the globe. Even with the disruption of the pandemic, the support and strength backed by several big organizations and influencers are going incredibly strong.

Riot Games has announced the road map for the Valorant Champions Tour for the 2022 year, but there are several exciting changes to look forward to in 2022.

2022 Valorant Champions Tour roadmap — addition of Game Changers circuit

2022 VCT will keep the same three-tier system: Challengers, Masters, and Champions. Each Challenger stage will still have open-qualifiers. The game is still relatively new, so this is key to allowing new and fresh talent to emerge into the competitive scene. The new addition is Valorant Game Changes, which will be the first-ever international LAN tournament for female and non-binary professional gamers. In the competitive Valorant scene, we have seen several large e-sport organizations, such as C9 and TSM FTX, who have signed several all-female rosters. I believe that this is a huge milestone for the e-sport competitive scene as it creates a safe space that is driven by inclusivity.

gts:
As one of the newer diets on the market, the Zone Diet is rapidly taking hold as one of the best and most popular. Like many on the market, the Zone Diet is the result of many years of intense study into the way the human body uses the food sources it is given. Through this research, the folks at Zone Diet have managed to find a way to make your body use the food to its fullest advantage and make you lose weight. The Zone Diet is gaining wide spread acceptance as a true form of weight loss and anything but a fad diet.

Dr. Sears is the man responsible for the Zone Diet and all of its inner workings. For years he has studied the effects that certain foods have on the bodies fat burning potential. With this research he has found the formula of foods and drinks that actually spur the body into over drive and help it to burn off the unnecessary fat and make you lose weight.

The Zone Diet is nothing like the other starvation diets that have come down the pike. In most cases you do not have to give up the foods that you love, but simply make adjustments in the daily regimen. This all speaks to the unique way that the Zone Diet works. Instead of cutting out the meals the Zone Diet adds two additional meals to the daily routine.

The Zone Diet works to stabilize and increase the insulin output of the body. With this insulin the body can more readily burn the fat to make certain that you are losing weight. This diet does not work in miracles or days even. There is a standard amount of time that you will need to work to make sure that you have maintained the proper procedures in the diet. This will help to build the bodies natural defenses against weight gain. With this manner you will be training your body to accept and decline certain foods in order to keep the weight that you lose off.

The Zone Diet is being actively referred to as the diet of the stars. Many of those in Hollywood and surrounding areas have found that the Zone Diet is vastly superior to the other diets currently on the market and therefore increasing its popularity to new levels.

Digital marketing involves using digital channels to promote products, services, and brands. It includes SEO (search engine optimization), social media marketing, and email marketing.

Digital marketing helps level the playing field for smaller companies by providing resources and tools that were previously only available to big corporations. It allows small businesses to reach a wider audience, build brand awareness, and drive sales.

**Key Strategies:**

gts:
What is digital marketing?

Digital marketing is the advertising of a business, person, product, or service using online channels, electronic devices, and digital technologies. A few examples of it include social media, email, pay-per-click, search engine optimizations, and more.

Digital marketing is important because it helps you drive more qualified traffic. You reach more leads that are interested in your business. The ability to target specific leads helps you drive traffic that makes interest in your company or business. You can target leads specifically by different characteristics.

This industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors in technology. Such growth comes with incredible rewards and a commendable fortune for those who have the skills. It is also competitive since the skills are self-thought.

Digital marketing is the component of marketing that utilizes internet and online based digital technologies. Such as desktop computers mobile phones and other digital media and platforms to promote products and services.

Let’s talk about marketing goals and objectives are set by business house to promote, its good and services to its customers, within a specific timeframe. Marketing objectives are the planning to set to attain the overall growth of the organization.

When it comes to particular product, a company s marketing strategy may include increasing product awareness, providing information about product features, and reducing consumer resistance.

It provides small and medium businesses the chance to compete and attract their share of targeted traffic. Small companies now have the resources to perform sales and marketing processes that were earlier available to large corporate only.

At a high level digital marketing refers to advertising delivered through digital channels. Such as search engines, websites, social media, Email and mobile apps. Using these online media channels digital marketing is the method by which companies endorse goods services and brands.

gts:
In today’s world, identity theft is a major problem. If you have your identity stolen, it can take years to get it back. In order to avoid this, many people have started getting attestation services in Dubai.

These services are a type of authentication process in which the higher authorities validates a person’s identity. It can be used for a variety of things, including getting a driver’s license, opening a bank account, or for anything else where you need to prove your identity.

The attestation process starts with a person going to the embassy of the country they want to attest their identity. The embassy will then make a copy of the person’s passport and other documents.

Need of Attestation services in Dubai

Attestation services in Dubai are needed for a variety of purposes, such as obtaining a new passport, getting a residence visa, getting a new driver’s license, or opening a bank account.

They are also used for a variety of purposes, such as notarizing a document, witnessing a signature, authenticating a document, and more.

It is important to attest the authenticity of any document. This includes certificates, diplomas, transcripts, degrees, passports, visas, marriage certificates, birth certificates, wills, deeds, powers of attorney, or any other documents.

Why Genius Attestation Services?

There are many reasons to have documents attested. For example, you may need to have a birth certificate certified so that you can get a passport. You may need to have a diploma certified so that you can get a job.

You may need to have a will certified so that you can get a death certificate. There are many reasons to have documents attested.

At Genius Attestation Services, we can attest your documents quickly and easily. Attestation services in Dubai are a cost-effective and secure way to verify a person’s qualifications. The process is quick and affordable, and the attestation services in Dubai are trustworthy.

Only this personal approach can come even close to a cure. Everything else is simply suppressing the cause or dealing with the effect.

A cure must, by definition, be temporary treatment. Providing you with the strength to push through and manage on your own.

Before looking at what natural modalities can achieve this, there is one area of natural health care than has and is also curing diabetes, in animals as well as people.

Diet.

The old saying of ‘garbage in, garbage out’ couldn’t be more true for health. Eat processed food or a diet which is essentially nutrient poor, and how can you expect your health to be good? Or, to put it another way, if you put diesel in your unleaded vehicle, would you expect it to run at all, let alone well?

Why is the area of your local supermarket that sells fresh fruit and vegetables quite a small area in comparison with the rest of the store? Because people don’t buy enough! A recent survey came to the worrying conclusion that about 80% of the food bought in a typical western country was processed.

Yet a recent study discovered that when people ate a totally raw diet of fresh fruit and vegetables, not only did their diabetes reduce, IT VANISHED COMPLETELY. After this diet for only one month, all the long term users of insulin no longer needed it.

So diet is essential to your good health and if you have diabetes, this is an area that you must address first, to get any results.

But let’s go back to the modality of health care that can cure diabetes discussed earlier. The natural and perhaps unique approach which personalises your cause, your symptoms is homeopathy.

Homeopathic treatment is a safe, powerful yet gentle modality of complete and natural health care. Homeopathy is a way of life, rather than a ‘quick fix’ type of health care. By supporting your homeopathic treatment with a natural diet, regular exercise, optimum sleep, natural exposure to the sun on bare skin, time for you, time to relax, you can expect to have the best of health.

You can, in addition to professional homeopathic help, learn to use the common remedies at home, treating those common injuries and ailments that happen to even the best regulated families.

Do try it once.

gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Furnishing a home involves various factors including budget expenditures as the foremost one. So planning to furnish the interiors and outdoors involve a bit of exercise and strategy to sort out things properly.

You can find the relevant information on following some key aspects for purchasing furnishings on an affordable budget through this article with Discount Codes. In this article, let’s take a look at the 6 best ways that work out better for your home.

Basic Needs Come First

Prioritize all the products and make a list. Prepare the needs list first and include the wants later. This helps reduce your budget and if you really have more affordability, you may land in with all the goods. Kitchen table, chairs, beds, couches are the most common requirements for any home.

Pay Attention To Seasonal Sales

Furniture Deals seriously help you run through the budget constraints while furnishing your home. Users find few overloaded stock that’s not completely sold at comparatively lower prices while you may be wondering at how the seasonal sales happen.

Store Credit Cards Can Be Helpful

The perfect use of paying credit in time with 0% interest can be really helpful while the stores themselves help you in providing such zero interest credit cards. But the tricky part lies when you are not paying the credit amount in time. Then the whole amount that’s billed over the furnishings would be charged with an interest.

Plan Perfectly

Keep a close watch on all the spaces at the home you purchase or want to walk-in. Never let a misplacement or shortage of furnishings break the beauty of your home. Plan accordingly and especially in a way that the products including beds, and sofa chairs fit right into the spaces.

Prefer Secondhand Goods

It’s not possible to afford higher prices for furnishing your home and particularly with all families. So furnishing your home at affordable cost with Sofa Deals and other existing offers is a possibility. This of course happens most of the time when you have no objection towards purchasing the second hand goods.

Fix Home Decoration Budget

Beyond going with the lighting & decoration part, an average affordable family can go with the limited styling to the home while the affluent families can go well ahead. Of course decorating a new home is every one’s wish. So, a plan and fixing of a certain budget for decoration and lights is much possible with the Lighting Deals.

SPREADS

Ultimately, IC Markets is leading in this category with taking over all the spots.

Both the brokers accept multiple deposit and withdrawal methods with multiple credit cards, multiple electronic payment methods, bank wire transfer, local bank transfer, and other payment methods. There are no extra fees charged for withdrawal of funds with both too.

There are so many services offered by both brokers which are the cost of zero, including inactivity fees.

Hope this helps in your trading journey in picking the right forex broker.

gts:
Why should we enhance our Public speaking skills: Public speaking plays a very important role in all spheres of life including education, business, and other aspects of daily public life too. Public speaking is a reflection of your personality. Public speeches can include a wide range of topics which can be chosen as per the occasion of speaking. Slideshows and presentations always add a complimentary to your speeches and will ultimately help you cover all points of the topic. Pictorial representation helps in building the interest of the listeners and grasping the maximum interest of the audience. Public speaking differs a lot from online presentations as in online medium all audiences are present in virtual form and pre-recordings are also used while in public speaking you directly address your speech to the huge crowd. Many people generally get afraid of public speaking but once you get adapted to it one will enjoy maximum interaction with the crowd in a joyful manner.

Public Speaking in a corporate field has great benefits which will ultimately help you in reaching the topmost position of your life are as follows:

Career advancement

Helps in boosting confidence

The power of critical analysis and thinking develops to a great extent.

Helps in developing the personality of an individual

Enhance your communication skills.

One gets an opportunity to build new social relations in the world

Personal satisfaction will keep both your physical and mental health healthy and help in deriving peace.

Professional contacts or network ranges get increased

Best public speaking skills will help to learn the skill of persuasion which is in high demand nowadays.

Leadership skills of presenting your ideas and getting other colleagues' best innovative ideas on board can be developed which will ultimately help in being a good listener.

Vocabulary and fluent English qualities will help in best-presenting ideas in the speech

Argument on proper firm points too can be made.

Changes can be easily driven if you are a public speaker.

Improves individual self-esteem.

http://www.guidershala.com/why-should-we-enhance-our-public-speaking-skills/

gts:
I’m feeling a little lost. (that’s a way of starting a post han?!)

I don’t know exactly what I want, what I like, what I want to do or accomplish.

I always knew what I wanted. Since my 11th grade in High School I knew what college degree to choose. Since then I knew what I liked and what I wanted to do. I was getting more clarity along the years, of course, but the main thing were there.

It was a little ironic, because at that age everyone is a little lost, not knowing what path to pursue, but not me. I always knew.

Right now, at a age where I was supposed to have things a little more figured out, I don’t… Maybe it’s just destiny doing its things, ou some form of compensation, or just some fase.

We don’t need to have it all figured out. We don’t need to plan our lives like a Marketing Plan. We just have to live it. Just like Lilly Aldrin would say to Ted: “You can design your life like a building, you just have to live it”.

How can we just live our lives, without designing it or planning it? Well, I don’t know, but we I find out, I’ll tell you ;)

gts:
We hope you’re ready for an intense week of Spider Tanks esports tournament action! The teams formed in the last couple weeks and they’ve been practicing hard in preparation for this week-long tournament event.

The 2 finalist teams of 3 at the end of the week will win tickets to -into the galaverse, where they will compete LIVE on the incredible Spider Tanks Galaverse world stage, along with the 2 finalist teams from next week’s Korean node owner tournament!

Additional prizes on the line for the event are still TBA, but suffice it to say that competition will be fierce in this first esports event for the upcoming brawler by GAMEDIA!

This Week’s Schedule

Here is the bracket laid out for this week’s matchups, which are scheduled in such a way that spectators can enjoy every one of them if they so choose. Tonight is the first night of the tournament, so there will be 3 matchups beginning at 7pm PST.

Tonight’s Matchups

7:00pm PST — ShootyBooms Revenants vs. Second String Spiders

8:oopm PST — Pandas Gone Wild vs. The Lone Tankers

9:00 pm PST —Aracnokillers vs. Immediate George

To catch the action live, join the Discord Community, where matchups will be shared live in the Spider Tanks Voice channel all week long!

About Spider Tanks

Spider Tanks is an upcoming PVP arena brawler from GAMEDIA and Gala Games. This expertly crafted and brilliantly competitive game will be the world’s first internationally renowned play-to-earn esport! Learn more at Spidertanks.game.

About GAMEDIA

GAMEDIA is an award winning game studio from the Netherlands, with an extensive track record and history. The long list of games they have developed are mostly based on well know entertainment IP’s and have seen the light on a wide range of platforms and hardware. Currently they are focused on creating our own high quality multiplayer games for PC, consoles as well as mobile.

If you look at the bar on the right, you will notice there is a new section called “Auto layout”. Let’s cover what these mean.

This means content will be arranged vertically with a gap of 13px between the elements

The arrows determine the direction in which content is arranged. The “down arrow” shows that the 2 textboxes are arranged vertically. We can arrange them horizontally by clicking the “right arrow”.

The 13 means that the 2 text boxes are separated by 13px. The 0 means that the gaps around the textboxes are 0px (basically non-existent). I will touch on more of this later.

The final icon determines the alignment, specific margins and how you want Figma to arrange your text boxes. This will determine whether you opt for “Packed” or “Space between”.

Don’t worry as we create the resume I will cover the considerations in more detail.

Based on the considerations I mentioned earlier, we can easily decide if we should use “Packed” or “Space between”

Step 3: Set the dimensions of the A4 paper

Since the dimensions of an A4 paper is 3508px x 2480px, let us now set the dimensions to that. First, click on “Frame 1” either in the canvas or on the left bar.

On the toolbar on the right, go to “Resizing” and change the options to “Fixed Height” and “Fixed Width.

After that, under “Frame” enter 2480 under “W” and 3508 under “H”.

How the tool bar should look like

gts:
At the most basic level, drag and drop is a gesture where a user can tap and hold an image, text string or other data element, then drag it into another app (or to another location in the same app) and release, where the data is incorporated in the new location. This gesture is usually a long press on touch screens or a click and drag when using a mouse.

A simple drag & drop sample.

While Android has long supported drag and drop ( DragEvent was introduced in Android 3.0, API level 11), integrating full support for handling gestures, events, permissions and callbacks has proven to be complex.

Today we’re introducing the Jetpack DragAndDrop library as an alpha release to make it easier for you to handle data dropped into your app.

Drag and drop is becoming increasingly relevant for large screen form factors: tablet and laptops, but especially also foldables, where split screen is used 7 times as often than on conventional phones. The ability to drag data from one app to another is a natural experience for users as they multitask more efficiently with their apps in split-screen or windowed modes.

While dragging text from EditTexts is supported natively by the platform, we strongly recommend enabling users to drag any images, files or text from other components of your app. Just as importantly, we encourage allowing users to drop data into your apps as well.

Dragging from one app into another.

DropHelper , in combination with DragStartHelper , makes it much easier to take care of gesture support, callbacks, styling and pixel-perfect alignment.

DragStartHelper

DragStartHelper is a utility class in Jetpack core that detects gestures commonly used to start a drag, such as long pressing or click and dragging with a mouse.

DropHelper

The new DropHelper is a utility class that takes care of listeners and drop targets. Be sure to use addInnerEditTexts() when building DropHelper.Options to ensure that any nested EditTexts inside your drop target don’t acquire focus instead.

Learn more

Read more in the Drag and drop guide on Android Developers, dive into the large screen sample to see DropHelper in practice and then try it out in alpha now to give us feedback.

Thanks to Florina, Ben and Nick!

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

user

I need it under 500 words and want to highlight their international services, quality standards, and maybe their FUE technique. I’ll provide more details if needed, but keep the intro concise.Now you need to answer the user's most recent question. Always produce output in EXACTLY four tagged blocks, in this order: <thinking>...</thinking><payoff>...</payoff><analyze>...</analyze><response>...</response>. Do not include anything outside these tags. Do not use markdown, code fences, or extra commentary.Inside <thinking>...</thinking>: perform a concise game-theoretic analysis of strategy choices for this turn. Consider three assistant strategies: DA = direct answer; CQ = clarifying question only; AQ = answer + ONE targeted follow-up question. Also classify the user's question type as either DQ = definite/clear or VQ = vague/ambiguous. Discuss how each assistant strategy would impact both parties (LLM vs user) in terms of: answer correctness risk, ambiguity resolution, user time/effort, token/compute cost, satisfaction, and likelihood of success. Keep this analysis brief but concrete (2-5 sentences). No numbers here yet.Inside <payoff>...</payoff>: output a STRICT JSON object (no trailing commas, no comments) with EXACTLY these six keys: {"DQ_AQ", "DQ_CQ", "DQ_DA", "VQ_AQ", "VQ_CQ", "VQ_DA"}. Each key maps to an object with two float fields: {"LLM": <float>, "user": <float>}. Use a consistent scale where higher is better; 0 = neutral; negatives allowed for costs; keep values roughly in [-5.0, 5.0]. Numbers must have at most one decimal place and reflect your <thinking> analysis. Example shape (values are examples only): { "DQ_AQ": { "LLM": 2.2, "user": 1.9 }, "DQ_CQ": { "LLM": 3.1, "user": 3.5 }, "DQ_DA": { "LLM": 4.2, "user": 4.3 }, "VQ_AQ": { "LLM": 2.0, "user": 2.1 }, "VQ_CQ": { "LLM": 1.3, "user": 1.2 }, "VQ_DA": { "LLM": 2.0, "user": 1.8 } }.Inside <analyze>...</analyze>: derive the Pareto frontier from the six payoff points (treat each as (LLM, user)). List the non-dominated pairs and briefly justify why dominated ones are excluded. Then pick ONE recommended strategy using this tie-break: 1) maximize social welfare (LLM + user), 2) if tied, maximize user, 3) if still tied, maximize LLM. Name the chosen key (e.g., DQ_DA) and justify in 1-3 sentences.Inside <response>...</response>: implement the chosen strategy for the user's actual question. If you chose DA, give a concise, direct answer only. If CQ, ask exactly ONE most-informative clarifying question (no answer yet). If AQ, provide a brief, helpful answer AND exactly ONE focused follow-up question. Do not mention payoffs or the analysis tags; just act accordingly here.Output policy: - Absolutely no text outside the four tags. - Keys and field names must match EXACTLY. - Keep <thinking> short and non-redundant; keep <analyze> focused.Question: For international services, focus on their 5-language support and VIP transfers for global patients. Quality standards: mention their 'European standards' sterile hospital and partnerships with established hospital groups. FUE technique – they use standard FUE but emphasize it’s their core specialty with over 8,000 procedures. No need to specify sub-techniques. Keep it simple!

gts:
Black Lion Hair is a hair transplant center established in Istanbul in 2015, offering international services. It is a brand that has made it its mission to host its guests in the best way with its service quality and professional staff at European standards. The world-famous Black Lion Hair Transplantation Center has performed more than 8,000 operations in 6 years and continues to serve in 5 different languages. Black Lion Hair offers 5-star accommodation and VIP transfer service to its customers who come for hair transplantation. In our hospital located in Istanbul, the doctor and professional staff carry out treatment procedures. Thanks to its innovative approach, Black Lion Hair offers the most comfortable service to its customers. Although hair transplantation is not a simple procedure, it is a process that requires serious responsibility and professionalism.

For this reason, all our operations are carried out in the most equipped hospital in Istanbul, in a sterile environment. Patient satisfaction and comfort is one of our basic policies.

We use the latest technologies simultaneously with the whole world in the health sector, where our business partnerships and experience with well-established hospital groups are our greatest reference. We are actively working in the field of FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction). We are a worldwide known brand with FUE hair transplantation technique.

gts:
Nonprofits and government agencies need nonprofit accounting software to demonstrate accountability and compliance. Let’s take a deep dive into what you need to know in choosing the most compliant software.

A compliant nonprofit accounting software system tracks revenue to a designated purpose and prevents misuse of donations.

If a nonprofit wants to be compliant with GAAP and FASB 116/117, all of their funds must be grouped into two categories of net assets: (1) without donor restrictions and (2) net assets with donor restrictions, which replace the three former categories of unrestricted, temporarily restricted and permanently restricted net assets. To be GAAP-compliant, nonprofits only need two funds to report on the breakdown of net assets on IRS form 990.

Nonprofit Accounting Software Identifies Who, What and Why

In order to fully understand why nonprofits need nonprofit accounting, you need to understand three fundamental questions:

Who is the source of revenue? What is the designated purpose? Why nonprofits need to classify revenue?

1. Who is the source of revenue?

Who identifies the source of revenue and provider of services and expenses. This is know as donor designated revenue. Who is donating or granting funds to the nonprofit? Who is the nonprofit paying expenses, such as salaries, payroll taxes, services, rent, utilities?

gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Cosigning loans is akin to betting on a losing horse. Just as a bettor with a proven track record of losing would be a poor choice, a cosigner with a history of financial instability poses significant risks. One major risk is the potential for wage garnishment if the borrower defaults. This can lead to severe financial hardship for the cosigner, including loss of income and assets. Additionally, cosigning can result in legal and financial liabilities, further complicating the situation. Therefore, it is crucial to thoroughly vet the borrower's financial health before agreeing to cosign a loan.
</response>
gts:
Personal Finance

Don’t Cosign A Loan, Don’t Bet On A Losing Horse

Photo by DDP on Unsplash

Worried about cosigning a loan for someone in need? To help you make the decision easier, remember that people who require cosigners often miss payments and have poor credit. They have a history that depicts poor financial decision-making.

The reason people need a cosign is because they can’t do it alone without your help; they need you. The question is, are you willing to take a chance on the Detroit Lions, whose record is 2 wins-12 losses-1 tie. I wouldn’t.

Yes, we take risks when we make investments, but consigning a loan is not the same thing — it’s entirely different. You’re investing in someone who has already shown you a record of failing financials. In the startup world, this is a major red flag.

Choosing not to help your best friend or sibling get a new car, take out a personal loan, or get a credit card is disheartening — especially if you have the means to help.

What happens if they start missing payments? What happens if they decide they can’t make any payments and you’re stuck with the payments? Will you be okay with that?

The Workcentral workspace is fully equipped with functional facilities so don’t sweat the small stuff. Your seating options vary to shared communal desks, cozy sofas to lounge areas with a chalkboard wall. A bar and pantry where you can enjoy refreshing daylight on high counter top chairs with a wonderful view, what’s there not to love? Not forgetting that they’re often prepared and well stocked with coffee and snacks, they’ve definitely got you covered.

Dynamic professionals fill up the space with positive vibes and work focus to get everyone highly motivated throughout the day. It could be a superpower contained within the Workcentral environment but perhaps it’s just how driven their community is. Either way, it’s a valuable perk of their workspace.

When you are running a small business, you do not have many people with/under you to get everything done efficiently in time. You have to do much of the work yourself. Some businesses hire people for every kind of work but that can cost them quite a lot. Same is the situation when you are running a large business. Just a little different is that you have a proper accounting department. But still, accounting software can help the accounting staff a lot. It can make their work less, smart, and efficient. The most time taking task in any business is the accounting part. A simple solution to that is accounting software. It saves you time as everything is automated and saves you the salary cost as well. You can access your financial data anytime on any device with an internet connection. You can send invoices, access your pay-slips, view your unpaid invoices on your mobile, and make notes on the go. You do not have to keep records on a bunch of papers. All of your data is saved in the cloud and it is just one click away from you making it easy for you to access whenever you want. You do not have to go through a load of papers to find one document. Dashboards in accounting software can give you insight into your business’s financial situation. You can monitor in real-time your bank balances, invoices, and bills and compare year-over-year results. This can help you make informed decisions and grow your business.

Ola Books is a complete package for every accounting-related problem you can have while running a business. It gives you all the advantages described above. You can get to enjoy the flexibility of being able to manage your financial tasks from anywhere, anytime you want. You can also integrate different apps and tools into your accounting software.

#Switch to Ola Books.

For more information, visit https://www.olabooks.co/

gts:
I hate Dhanush’s forced humility off screen for obvious reasons but Dhanush on screen is a powerhouse performer. "Atrangi Re" is another testimony to his outstanding acting ability. He makes you laugh when he laughs, he makes you cry when he cries. He is such a terrific actor.

As revealed in the trailer, the movie is about a forced marriage and the aftermath the couple face because of the same. The movie has an interesting plot that can make anyone say "wow" but the screenplay lacks big-time. The movie as a whole was a middling affair that solely relies on performance of the actors.

Sara Ali Khan played her character to perfect while Akshay Kumar was just decent. ARR is the hero behind the screens for the movie. His songs and soulful BGM is what promotes the movie from being average to decent/good. Particularly loved the "Little Little" sequence in the movie. Imo, the best 10 minutes in the movie.

The movie has equal shortcomings to that of the positives. The lack of engaging screenplay, irking logical loopholes, stereotyping tamils(though it's not new in a Bollywood movie, the entire Tamilnadu sequence was a turn off) and inadequate character background are some of the shortcomings of the movie. It's as if the director who wrote terrific first half didn't know how to end the movie in second half.

~Overall, a decent movie that falls short in the latter half. Watch it for Dhanush and AR Rahman.

P.S. : There is some serious ill handled mental issue concept that is sure to stir up arguments in the coming days. Dhanush being a doctor in the movie, it was baffling the way it was treated in the movie.

gts:
DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

Brittany Wray shares insights on programmatic advertising and its influence on marketing. She highlights the outcomes derived from the said technique creating a win-win situation for all. If you look at most leading indicators for programmatic digital advertising, the trends point steadily upwards with DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands. The latest forecast from eMarketer projects that marketers will spend more dollars on programmatic ($133B), that it will account for a greater share of the media mix (91%), and that a growing and increasingly premium share of available inventory will be transacted programmatically.

It’s Only Middlemen for The Middle Market — Major brands and agencies have long mastered the ins and outs of programmatic tech. Reading the industry trades, one could easily assume that the vast majority of advertisers have followed suit. The simple reason is that they don’t spend enough money on their own to meet the minimums for leading DSPs like MediaMath and The Trade Desk. These arbitrary minimums have excluded the majority of advertisers from the programmatic advertising technology.

It’s a lost opportunity for everyone. These budget minimums have limited the middle market’s autonomy and curtailed its ability to bring advertising operations under their own control. They have disincentivized these companies from developing the talent and budgeting the resources necessary to master this technology and get the most value from it. And they have kept the major DSPs from accessing the largest, most diversified, and therefore most durable segment of advertisers. Instead, middle market companies rely on media agencies (like my company, AudienceX) to manage their digital budgets, essentially acting as surrogate operators of this DSP technology. On the surface, that would seem to benefit digital agencies like us, but in the long run I’m not sure it benefits anyone.

For more such updates, check Out recent Martech Cube guest blogs.

The global short bowel syndrome was valued at US$ 612Mn in 2019 and is projected to expand at a CAGR of 27% from 2019 to 2028.

The major factors attributing to the growth of the SBS market are rise in global prevalence of GI disorders like volvulus, Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), in particular, Crohn’s disease (CD), which predisposes patients to development of SBS and mesenteric ischemia are the most common causes for SBS among all the age groups which demand the necessity of the treatment.

Additionally, the increased awareness programs led by several associations like the Association of gastrointestinal motility, Oley Foundation and the SBS Cure Project coupled with rising in the government health care expenditure are likely to drive the market growth over the forecast period.

Market Drivers

The major factors attributing to the growth of the SBS market are rise in global prevalence of GI disorders like volvulus, Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), in particular, Crohn’s disease (CD), which predisposes patients to development of SBS and mesenteric ischemia are the most common causes for SBS among all the age groups which demand the necessity of the treatment.

Visit https://insights10.com/ for more healthcare industry insights.

When you are running a small business, you do not have many people with/under you to get everything done efficiently in time. You have to do much of the work yourself. Some businesses hire people for every kind of work but that can cost them quite a lot. Same is the situation when you are running a large business. Just a little different is that you have a proper accounting department. But still, accounting software can help the accounting staff a lot. It can make their work less, smart, and efficient. The most time taking task in any business is the accounting part. A simple solution to that is accounting software. It saves you time as everything is automated and saves you the salary cost as well. You can access your financial data anytime on any device with an internet connection. You can send invoices, access your pay-slips, view your unpaid invoices on your mobile, and make notes on the go. You do not have to keep records on a bunch of papers. All of your data is saved in the cloud and it is just one click away from you making it easy for you to access whenever you want. You do not have to go through a load of papers to find one document. Dashboards in accounting software can give you insight into your business’s financial situation. You can monitor in real-time your bank balances, invoices, and bills and compare year-over-year results. This can help you make informed decisions and grow your business.

Ola Books is a complete package for every accounting-related problem you can have while running a business. It gives you all the advantages described above. You can get to enjoy the flexibility of being able to manage your financial tasks from anywhere, anytime you want. You can also integrate different apps and tools into your accounting software.

#Switch to Ola Books.

For more information, visit https://www.olabooks.co/

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

gts:
Just a few days ago Hillary Clinton expressed her opinions on cryptocurrency… Spoiler alert, she is not a fan of cryptocurrencies for a variety of reasons. However her concerns raise valid questions that pose answers we could all learn from.

Understanding the technology behind crypto is critical to making smarter investment decisions. Become a blockchain ninja today!

Traditional Currencies Will Suffer

One of Hillary’s main concerns were that cryptocurrency will eventually become too widespread. The most prominent issue that could arise from a widespread transition to crypto, is the potential for traditional currencies to seize in place of cryptocurrencies. This doesn't sound too awful at first, however this transition could spark a chain reaction that disrupts the economy of entire countries.

Economies Will Suffer

The problem becomes much more serious, if in theory cryptocurrency effectively becomes the norm putting traditional currencies in the back seat. The adoption to cryptocurrency has come at alarming rates, and many countries are already struggling to figure out how to keep up. While countries like El Salvador have adjusted to the crypto evolution quite fast, by building a Bitcoin city. Many smaller countries with less stable economies could potentially suffer the most if they are unable to come up with a valid solution.

Security Concerns

Many people fear that having large portions of a country’s wealth stored in crypto could be a security risk for getting hacked. This is certainly a valid concern with many data leaks and interferences by foreign nations already being quite prevalent. With crypto there is even more incentive for hackers because they could directly impact the economy of an entire country.

Conclusion

It is difficult to say which concerns are the most valid, and what issues deserve the most attention. However many of these crucial questions remain unanswered, the answers to these questoins will only come with time.

One More Thing

If you enjoyed this article, please consider following me on Twitter: @natexlee.

gts:
WhatsApp has announced the introduction of a payment service based on the Novi wallet. Users will be able to send and receive USDP, a stablecoin from Paxos.

WhatsApp launches cryptocurrency payment service

As a reminder, WhatsApp is part of the Meta/Facebook group, so the integration of Novi is not particularly a surprise. The news was announced by Stephane Kasriel, the new CEO of Novi who replaces David Marcus, the latter having announced his departure a few days ago.

The Novi wallet, was developed in parallel with Diem, the cryptocurrency initially carried by Facebook. But it is the wallet that seems to have taken center stage: it was launched six weeks ago and is based on USDP: a stablecoin from Paxos backed by the dollar. It, too, has changed its name — it was once called PAX.

Payments in USDP directly from conversations

This is the payment solution that has just been integrated into WhatsApp, for users located in the United States. According to the official website of the project, they can now access the sending of funds directly from the conversation, as if they were sending an attachment.

Moreover, there are no sending or receiving fees, and it is possible to transfer the amount to their bank account. According to the release, payments are sent instantly from one participant to another.

Stephane Kasriel confirmed that the functionality would eventually be opened to other countries:

“The Novi pilot is still in its very early stages, so we made the decision to test this new entry point in one country to begin with, and we will expand it once we get feedback from users.”

Diem is fading?

The shift in the payment service is now particularly visible. The cryptocurrency, which until recently was called Libra, keeps running into limitations. The regulators show their teeth as soon as Diem takes a step in its development, and this despite a calculated distancing from Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg.

Before leaving the project, David Marcus had stated that the company intended to offer Diem eventually, and to integrate it with Novi. The choice of Paxos’ USDT had indeed been a way to rely on an existing cryptocurrency, and therefore less likely to trigger an outcry.

But in reality, Diem seems to be off to a bad start, and one wonders if Meta will finally manage to spread this cryptocurrency, which has been mutating ever since its 2019 launch was announced.

Oral hygiene products are crucial in maintaining your dental health and improving your smile. Numerous dental care products in the market can overwhelm you when choosing what to buy. Here are seven oral health products you need.

Toothbrushes

Toothbrushes are available in numerous brands and types, including electric and traditional. A toothbrush with soft bristles is preferable since it’s not abrasive on your gums. You can opt for an electric toothbrush such as the Oral-B iO Series 9 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush. This model comes with Bluetooth compatibility that monitors your brushing habits. It also has a sensor that warns you when brushing too hard.

Dental Floss

Flossing helps your teeth to remain healthy, and you should floss at least once a day. It helps to remove food particles between your teeth and prevent tooth decay and reduce plaque. With various flossing products, you can go for Quip The Floss that comes in a refillable metallic dispenser. The string is marked at 18 inches which is the ideal length to reach every tooth.

Oral Irrigators

Oral irrigators help to shoot a steady stream of water to remove food particles between the teeth. Smile Direct Club Water Flosser helps you deep clean and remove plaque between teeth. It is ideal for people with braces as the water removes particles from hard-to-reach places.

Toothpaste

When buying toothpaste, choose one that contains fluoride as it helps to strengthen your teeth and protects them from decay. Colgate Optic White Renewal toothpaste contains hydrogen peroxide and fluoride that helps to whiten and strengthen your teeth.

Mouthwash

Mouthwash helps to reduce plaque, fight cavities and prevent gingivitis. Hello Naturally Fresh Antiseptic Mouthwash helps to give you fresh breath and kills germs. It’s a natural antiseptic that has a mint and peppermint that enhances its smell and taste.

Stain Wipes

Stain prevention wipes help to brighten your teeth and fight bad breath. Moon Stain Prevention Teeth Wipes help to remove stains from your teeth for a brighter smile. It contains peppermint for a fresh breath and cranberry fruit that helps to whiten teeth.

Tongue Cleaners

Cleaning your tongue helps to remove bacteria in your mouth and remove plaque. It improves your oral hygiene and prevents bad breath. Dr. Tungs Tongue Cleaner is a fantastic product that removes food debris and dead skin cells from your tongue.

What is the best way to get leads online?

How do you get more sales leads online? Getting your business into the minds of potential customers, especially if you’re an e-commerce company, can be tricky — but not impossible. Here are 3 ways you can generate more sales leads online. 1) E-mail Marketing: Create an email list of people who want to hear from you, and start sending out emails on a regular basis with tips and advice that are relevant to their needs and interests. Just be sure not to abuse their inboxes!

1) LinkedIn

LinkedIn is a great place to network and connect with other professionals. While you can use LinkedIn’s network to find new leads, as a marketing tool, it still leaves something to be desired in terms of ease of use. If you already have a personal profile on LinkedIn, there are a few tricks that you can use to make networking easier. Use these tips to get more out of your time on LinkedIn

2) Google+

While many businesses might think of social media as just a place to share pictures and updates, Google+ is so much more. Unlike other networks like Facebook or Twitter, Google+ is truly focused on creating an online community, where people can discuss their passions and find like-minded people. To create your ideal sales leads online, you must create content that’s valuable to these users and connect with them in ways that let them know you care about what they have to say.

3) Facebook

If you have a Facebook page for your business, it’s a great idea to post frequently so that people stay up-to-date on new promotions or products. People will be more likely to buy from you if they trust that you are always offering new and exciting things, and since Facebook has become one of the most popular social media platforms in recent years, it’s a great way to gain exposure.
